Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: Fish Notify
Description: Plays a sound when a fish is caught, depending on tug-strength
Punchline: Plays a sound when a fish is caught

Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: RetainerTrack
Description:
Keeps track of who a retainer belongs to - if you have seen the retainer's owner locally (if you were on the same party, or if you have seen an item crafted by them).

Tracking is unavailable if the crafter isn't the retainer owner (to avoid resellers being attributed incorrectly), and if the tooltip says 'Obtaining Signature'.
Punchline: Track who a retainer belongs to.
Changelog:
v6.1 (2025-03-31)
- Re-add account id logic (was temporarily disabled in v6.0)
- Dependency updates for NET 9

v6.0 (2025-03-29)
- API 12
- Removed account id logic for now due to the patch 7.2 changes

v5.0 (2024-11-24)
- API 11

v4.3 (2024-07-16)
- Fix load error

v4.2 (2024-07-16)
- Add /accountid command
- use AccountId/ContentId properties from clientstructs instead of custom mapping

Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: Discard Helper
Description: Small plugin to help keep your inventory organized (especially when automating retainers or submersibles) by discarding items you don't want (e.g. Stuffed Alphas)
Punchline: Discard items automatically via a command or as a post-venture task for AutoRetainer

- Add collectables to discardable items
- Update dependencies

v6.2 (2024-07-19)
- Automatically adjust max gear item level based on the highest ilvl green item

Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: Influx
Description: Uploads your game statistics (such as quest progress, gil, retainer stats) to an InfluxDB or QuestDB instance, making it possible to automatically track your progress through external tools such as Grafana.
Punchline: Sync game stats to InfluxDB or QuestDB
Changelog:
v4.1 (2025-04-05)
- Fix code that only works on the English game version

v4.0 (2025-03-29)

v3.0 (2025-03-16)
- Add experimental support for QuestDB

v2.2 (2025-03-02)
- Make plugin compatible with AllaganTools 1.11.1+, thanks to nihilistzsche
- Add 'Test Connection' button in the config window

v2.1 (2025-02-27)
- Add 'Auto enroll characters on login', thanks to Asuna

Author: Liza Carvelli
Name: Questionable
Description:
A tiny little quest helper plugin, which does quests for you automatically where possible. Uses navmesh to automatically walk to all quest waypoints, and tries to automatically complete all steps along the way (excluding dungeons, single player duties and combat).

Not all quests are supported, check the discord or git repository for an up-to-date list.

Required Plugins: vnavmesh, TextAdvance, Lifestream
Changelog:
v5.7 (2025-04-13)
- Add Pandora's Box to initial setup
- Add 'Dependencies' tab in the configuration which shows a list of all required/recommended plugins (same as the initial setup)
- Add config options to skip aether currents, class/job/role quests, ARR primals quests or Crystal Tower quests automatically
- Remove waypoints for the stairs in Whitebrim (fixed in vnav)
- Fix Sprint never triggering
- Fix Lv10 archer quests
- Fix 'Wake of Destruction' if you started as marauder
- Update fallback logic for when the game reports that you're done with all of the MSQ
- Ignore fate mobs for combat
- Ignore enemies that are outside of nameplate rendering range for combat if they're only spawned after player actions (e.g. upon entering an area, after using an item, after an interaction)
- Minor ARR adjustments

v5.6 (2025-04-10)
- Add Hatching-tide (2025) event quests
- Add Patch 7.2 fantasia as pseudo-event quest
- Add jumping as a possible way for vnav to get unstuck
- Add teleport after Brayflox Longstop if you're no longer in Eastern La Noscea, since completing the dungeon doesn't teleport you automatically (unlike almost every other instance)
- Adjust some combat logic bits
- Fix some code bits that only worked on English game versions
- Fix wrong enemy ids being used in 'Wake of Destruction'
- Update some ARR paths to not be interrupted after dungeon/single player instance cutscenes
- Update 'Dressed for Conquest' to recognize more types of garlean soldiers so that, overall, less enemies need to be killed
- Change GetCurrentlyActiveEventQuests IPC to only return available incomplete quests

v5.5 (testing only) (2025-04-05)
- Update combat priority logic: Questionable will now prioritize enemies that are already in-combat before attempting to pull other quest-related mobs
- Fix single player duties that were previously marked as e.g. UseItem, thus not allowing them to be configured in the duty config window
- Add fallback for when the game reports that all MSQ quests are done for a few seconds, which can happen sometimes after turning in quests (althoug I'm unsure if it always affects specific quests or if that's just random or a slow update on the client)
- Add debug overlay for combat priority data

v5.4 (2025-04-04)
- Add Endwalker Melee and Healer role quests
- Add Endwalker role master quests (the ending once you have completed all other role quests)
- Add searching by quest id in Journal
- Fix mount being used for flying steps ignoring how close you were to your next target (edge case, not typically relevant)
- Fix 'Lurkers in the Grotto' and 'Underneath the Sultantree' stopping Questionable after the single player duty

v5.3 (2025-04-01)
- Fix movement issues
